  • misspelt fuchsia, so it didn't color.
  • when I click the "more choices" button, the previous color loads, not the color that is going to be assigned to that bar.

@docwilmot Ok, let me do it manually. Meanwhile could you please take a look at https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/poll/issues/11

Add color picker support · Issue #11 · backdrop-contrib/poll
Instead of manually entering HTML-codes for colors, it would be great to have some kind of color picker. Now I have commented out first stab on poll/poll.module Lines 917 to 921 in 68c578b /* if (m...
If you comment that code-block back in again, then you will see the popup colorpicker is there for each line, however it does not populate the respective field.
And I'm afraid it won't work that way, however I still wished it was possible to re-use Color modules colorpicker by other contrib modules. Unfortunately, I couldn't find any proper hooks
Unbelievable! It works even with Color module disabled! Thank you very much, @docwilmot for your hint!
